title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses the wild Final Four matchup between Duke and North Carolina that officially ended Coach K's coaching career and what made college basketball great during this time of year. As the Laker season continues to spiral downward, he explains why LeBron James is starting to look disengaged as the team is teetering on missing the playoffs. He points out which NFL team has separated themselves from the rest of the league. Plus, former North Carolina head coach Roy Williams joins the show to give his thoughts on their chances to win the National Championship tonight against Kansas. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
